ygData.subject: Re: Race Wars Server
ygData.msgSnippet: There is absolutely no way I will ever be playing on the race wars server. If I wanted to play a game where people ran around killing each other I would go
ygData.messageBody:
There is absolutely no way I will ever be playing on the race wars
server. If I wanted to play a game where people ran around killing each
other I would go back to Ultima Online. Which I wouldn't because I left
that damn game just for the pvp reason. (I'm very upset with the whole
pvp thing as you may have noticed.) My sweetie says he and his friends
are going to go play on it and would I like to join. Isn't it funny
that all the people I've heard of that want to go kill each other are
guys!? hmmm? If I wanted to play with a bunch of asinine 13 yr old boys
I would go back to UO. Ok, I'm a little bitter. *laughs* Btw, have you
guys been to that page where EQ players can have their pics put up? I
went and had a look around and to my suprise half of the pics up there
were women! I'm thinking maybe we aren't as rare as I had thought! :) I
just sent mine in today so maybe he will have it up in a couple days.
You guys have to go look at it, they're funny I promise. Ok, two of
them should make you laugh. One definitely will. *snickers*
I have a char already on Quellious and would be thrilled to get
together with ya'll. I hope the time is ok, I have a volunteer project
going on from July 26th to the 6th of August and won't be home until
after 6 those nights. If I can't make it, maybe we can plan for another
time again later? *Smiles* Happy Hunting!
